1.description: Now a seasoned investigator with his wife Steris, facing new threats from The Set's global operations and dealing with strange harmonium-related incidents across the city.

25.description: Discovers disturbing connections between The Set's operations and off-world influences that threaten not just Elendel but all of Scadrial.

60.description: Confronts the reality of off-world interference in his planet's affairs and makes difficult choices about Scadrial's future relationship with the broader cosmere.

1.description: Continues his partnership with Wax while developing his relationship with Ranette and dealing with his own fears about commitment and mortality.

35.description: Faces personal growth and makes sacrifices that demonstrate his evolution from a carefree thief into a true hero willing to risk everything for others.

72.description: His final actions in the climactic battle showcase the depth of his loyalty and courage, proving himself as more than just comic relief but a true friend and hero.

1.description: Now fully integrated into Wax's dangerous lifestyle, she provides crucial organizational skills and unexpected courage in confronting The Set's latest schemes.

30.description: Takes on greater leadership responsibilities during crisis situations, proving herself as capable of making difficult decisions under pressure.

1.description: Now promoted to captain, she leads major investigations into The Set while coordinating law enforcement responses to escalating threats across the city.

20.description: Makes crucial discoveries about The Set's infiltration of law enforcement and government, coordinating efforts to root out corruption at all levels.

55.description: Takes command during the city-wide crisis, coordinating civilian evacuation and law enforcement response to The Set's final gambit.

2.description: Continues serving as the team's shapeshifting infiltrator, using her abilities to investigate The Set's operations while struggling with questions about kandra loyalty.

25.description: Provides crucial intelligence about off-world threats and helps the team understand the cosmic implications of The Set's activities.

65.description: Makes the ultimate sacrifice to protect her friends and Scadrial from off-world interference, demonstrating her complete loyalty to her chosen family.

3.description: The brilliant gunsmith continues developing advanced weapons while navigating her complicated feelings for Wayne and her role in fighting The Set.

30.description: Creates specialized weapons designed to combat off-world technology and threats, proving essential to the team's arsenal in their final battle.

66.description: Her innovations prove crucial in the final confrontation, and she finally admits her feelings for Wayne while creating weapons that can affect cosmere-aware beings.

45.description: Revealed to be operating through the Ghostbloods organization, working to protect Scadrial from off-world interference while pursuing his own agenda.

60.description: Confronts the team directly about the cosmic threats facing Scadrial and reveals his true motivations for opposing other Shards' interference.

70.description: Makes his final play to protect Scadrial, working both with and against the protagonists to ensure his world's safety from cosmic threats.

15.description: Provides guidance to his servants while struggling with the ethical implications of interference in mortal affairs during the escalating crisis.

45.description: Revealed to be in conflict with Kelsier over the best way to protect Scadrial, creating tension between divine will and mortal determination.

65.description: Makes difficult choices about direct intervention in mortal affairs when faced with the threat of off-world invasion and manipulation.

8.description: The ancient kandra provides historical context and wisdom about past crises while helping coordinate kandra responses to The Set's activities.

35.description: Reveals crucial information about off-world threats and the history of Shardic interference on Scadrial, drawing parallels to ancient conflicts.

65.description: Plays a crucial role in the final battle, using his ancient knowledge and abilities to help protect Scadrial from cosmic-level threats.

8.description: Wax's sister continues her work with The Set, now revealed to be operating at the highest levels of their organization with knowledge of off-world contacts.

36.description: Confronts Wax directly about their family loyalty versus her commitment to what she believes is Scadrial's future, revealing her cosmic perspective.

66.description: Makes her final stand, choosing her ideology over family bonds while demonstrating the depth of off-world influence on The Set's operations.

1.description: Now working closely with Marasi as she takes on greater responsibilities, coordinating police responses to The Set's escalating activities across the city.

35.description: Coordinates city-wide emergency response as The Set's activities threaten civilian populations, working to maintain order during crisis.

4.description: Deals with increasing political pressure as The Set's activities threaten not just Elendel but regional stability, coordinating government response.

46.description: Faces the reality of off-world threats to his jurisdiction and makes difficult decisions about Scadrial's place in the broader cosmere.

5.description: Continues leading The Set's operations with increasing desperation as off-world pressures mount and his organization faces exposure.

35.description: Reveals the true scope of The Set's off-world connections and their role as agents of external Shardic influence on Scadrial.

60.description: Makes his final play to fulfill his off-world masters' agenda, demonstrating the extent to which he has been corrupted by external influence.

1.description: A reliable constable who continues working crime scenes related to The Set while dealing with increasingly strange incidents involving harmonium.
Works alongside other constables investigating The Set's escalating activities while dealing with reports of strange metallic incidents across the city.
Continues managing Wax and Steris's household while adapting to the increased security needs and dangerous lifestyle of his employers.

8.description: The mayor of Bilming who becomes involved in The Set's operations, either willingly or through coercion, as they establish operations in his city.

32.description: Reveals the extent of The Set's infiltration of Bilming's government and their use of the city as a base for off-world operations.

6.description: A scientist working for The Set who studies harmonium and its potential applications, particularly its explosive properties when exposed to certain conditions.

30.description: Makes breakthrough discoveries about harmonium that enable The Set's final weapons program, creating city-threatening explosive devices.

58.description: Reveals the true scope of his research into harmonium's potential for mass destruction and its connection to off-world technological requirements.

15.description: A Ghostbloods operative working to counter The Set's activities while serving the organization's mysterious agenda regarding off-world threats.

40.description: Provides crucial intelligence about The Set's off-world connections while working to coordinate Ghostbloods' response to cosmic threats.

60.description: Reveals her true loyalties and the Ghostbloods' role in protecting Scadrial from Shardic interference, working alongside the protagonists.

10.description: A diplomatic representative from the Southern Scadrians (Malwish) who comes to Elendel to discuss growing tensions and technological exchanges.

30.description: Warns northern leaders about The Set's infiltration of southern territories and their use of harmonium technology for destructive purposes.

50.description: Coordinates joint response between Northern and Southern Scadrian forces against The Set's final operations and off-world interference.

2.description: Continues working crime scenes and collecting evidence related to The Set's activities, dealing with increasingly bizarre harmonium-related incidents.

7.description: A Set field operative who manages regional operations and coordinates with off-world contacts to further The Set's agenda in Bilming and surrounding areas.

32.description: Coordinates The Set's harmonium weapons program while managing the organization's infiltration of Bilming's government and industry.

9.description: A Set intelligence specialist who manages information gathering and coordinates with off-world sources about cosmic threats and opportunities.

34.description: Provides crucial intelligence about Ghostbloods activities and helps coordinate The Set's counter-operations against their rivals.

25.description: Revealed to have survived his apparent death and been recruited by off-world forces, now serving as an enforcer for cosmic-level operations.

45.description: Confronts his past while serving new masters, demonstrating enhanced abilities granted by off-world intervention and technology.

8.description: The chief of Bilming's constabulary who finds his authority undermined by The Set's infiltration of local government and their operations in the city.

28.description: Attempts to coordinate resistance against The Set's takeover of Bilming while protecting civilian populations from escalating violence.

5.description: A legitimate researcher studying harmonium's properties who becomes caught up in The Set's weapons program and must choose between science and ethics.

25.description: Provides crucial information about harmonium's dangerous potential while working to develop countermeasures to The Set's weapons program.

20.description: An off-world agent working with the Ghostbloods who brings knowledge of other Shardworlds and helps coordinate resistance to Autonomy's influence.

50.description: Provides crucial intelligence about Autonomy's activities on other worlds and helps the team understand the cosmic scope of the threat to Scadrial.

40.description: Revealed to be operating as an avatar of the Shard Autonomy, working to destabilize Scadrial and weaken Harmony's influence over the planet.

60.description: Leads the final assault on Scadrial's stability, coordinating with The Set and other off-world forces to complete Autonomy's conquest.

1.description: A reliable constable known for always wearing his distinctive hat, who continues investigating crime scenes related to The Set's activities.

3.description: Head of security for House Ladrian who coordinates protection for Wax and Steris while dealing with increased threats from The Set.

28.description: Leads estate defenses during The Set's direct attacks on House Ladrian properties and coordinates with city constabulary.

2.description: Continues managing House Ladrian's complex financial affairs while helping track The Set's financial networks and money laundering operations.

32.description: Provides crucial intelligence about The Set's funding sources and their connections to off-world financial networks.

11.description: A Set enforcer who handles the organization's violent operations and intimidation tactics, now equipped with off-world enhanced capabilities.

36.description: Demonstrates enhanced abilities granted by off-world technology, making him a more dangerous opponent than typical Set operatives.

12.description: A Southern Scadrian engineer who works to maintain technological neutrality while his homeland becomes involved in the conflict between cosmic forces.

36.description: Helps develop countermeasures to The Set's harmonium weapons while maintaining Southern Scadrian technological independence.

18.description: A Ghostbloods deep cover agent who has infiltrated The Set's operations to gather intelligence about their off-world connections.

39.description: Provides crucial intelligence that helps the protagonists understand The Set's true agenda and their connection to Autonomy.

14.description: A coinshot assassin working for The Set who has been enhanced with off-world technology to make him nearly unstoppable in combat.

35.description: Reveals the extent of his enhancements while pursuing the protagonists, demonstrating how off-world technology can amplify allomantic abilities.

22.description: A Feruchemist who maintains historical records and knowledge about Scadrial's past, helping provide context for current cosmic threats.

46.description: Provides crucial historical context about previous Shardic interference on Scadrial and how past heroes dealt with cosmic-level threats.

2.description: A veteran constable who continues investigating The Set's activities while adapting to increasingly bizarre crimes involving harmonium and off-world technology.

9.description: A scientist working for The Set who specializes in harmonium weaponization and off-world technology integration.

33.description: Makes breakthrough discoveries about harmonium's potential for mass destruction while working to integrate off-world technological components.

16.description: An ancient kandra who provides additional perspective on cosmic threats while serving Harmony's interests in the growing crisis.

46.description: Plays a crucial role in coordinating kandra responses to off-world threats while maintaining their ancient duty to serve and protect.

20.description: A Bilming citizen who organizes local resistance against The Set's takeover of their city, working to protect innocent civilians.

44.description: Coordinates civilian evacuation and resistance efforts during The Set's final operations in Bilming, helping save innocent lives.

4.description: An investigative reporter who works to expose The Set's activities while dealing with attempts to suppress information about their operations.

28.description: Publishes crucial exposés about The Set's infiltration of government and their connections to off-world forces, helping rally public opposition.

13.description: A Southern Scadrian airship captain who helps coordinate transportation and logistics for forces opposing The Set's operations.

37.description: Leads aerial reconnaissance and support during the final battles, using Southern Scadrian technology to counter The Set's advantages.

17.description: A Set infiltrator who has penetrated high levels of Elendel's government, feeding intelligence to The Set about official responses to their activities.

38.description: Coordinates government responses to benefit The Set's final operations while working to undermine official resistance efforts.

3.description: A veteran constable with decades of experience who provides stability and wisdom during the investigation of increasingly bizarre crimes.

5.description: Head of House Harms who supports his daughter and son-in-law while dealing with the political implications of their dangerous activities.

29.description: Uses his political influence to support the fight against The Set while helping coordinate noble house responses to the crisis.

35.description: A high-ranking Ghostbloods operative who coordinates their response to The Set's final operations and off-world threats to Scadrial.

55.description: Leads the Ghostbloods' direct intervention in the final battle, revealing their true role as protectors of Scadrial from cosmic threats.

6.description: Head of security for Elendel's harmonium storage facilities who must deal with increased theft attempts and The Set's infiltration efforts.

30.description: Coordinates defensive efforts to prevent The Set from acquiring the harmonium needed for their mass destruction weapons program.

38.description: A direct agent of Autonomy who arrives on Scadrial to oversee The Set's final operations and ensure the Shard's objectives are achieved.

58.description: Demonstrates off-world powers and abilities while coordinating the final assault on Scadrial's independence from Shardic interference.

4.description: The city's medical examiner who investigates deaths related to The Set's activities, discovering increasingly bizarre causes involving harmonium exposure.

28.description: Documents the medical effects of off-world technology and harmonium weapons, providing crucial intelligence for countermeasures.

9.description: A noble house leader who supports the effort against The Set while using her political influence to coordinate responses among the nobility.

33.description: Coordinates noble house resources to support the final battle against The Set while helping maintain social order during the crisis.

19.description: A kandra operating as a deep cover agent within The Set, gathering intelligence for Harmony while maintaining their cover identity.

39.description: Provides crucial intelligence about The Set's final plans and their off-world connections, helping coordinate the divine response.

42.description: A former Steel Ministry obligator who survived the Catacendre and now works to understand the cosmic implications of current events.

relationships.The Set: Opposes as perversion of old order

7.description: A constable who works night shifts and has observed unusual activities related to The Set's operations during off-hours.

47.description: A Ghostbloods scholar who provides crucial information about off-world threats and cosmic-level events affecting Scadrial.

11.description: The Set's communications specialist who manages their radio networks and coordinates between different operational cells.

23.description: A Southern Scadrian pilot who helps coordinate aerial support and transportation for forces opposing The Set's operations.

8.description: A detective who specializes in investigating complex cases involving The Set and helps coordinate multi-jurisdictional responses.

12.description: The foreman of harmonium mining operations who must deal with The Set's attempts to steal raw materials for their weapons program.

33.description: A Ghostbloods enforcer who handles physical confrontations and helps protect Ghostbloods operations from Set interference.

16.description: A doctor in Bilming who treats casualties from The Set's operations while working to protect civilian populations.

13.description: The Set's supply coordinator who manages equipment and resources for their operations while coordinating with off-world suppliers.

10.description: A security captain who protects noble houses allied against The Set while coordinating defensive preparations.

14.description: A training sergeant who prepares constables for dealing with The Set's enhanced operatives and off-world technology threats.

27.description: An information broker working with the Ghostbloods who provides crucial intelligence about off-world activities and cosmic threats.

19.description: A field medic working for The Set who treats their operatives while helping maintain their enhanced abilities through off-world medical techniques.

15.description: A forensics specialist who analyzes evidence from scenes involving off-world technology and harmonium-related incidents.

17.description: A Southern Scadrian trade representative who works to maintain commercial relationships while the political situation deteriorates.

34.description: A kandra who serves as a messenger between Harmony and his other servants, coordinating divine responses to the cosmic crisis.

22.description: A weapons technician who helps develop and maintain The Set's enhanced arsenal, including harmonium-based weapons.

20.description: The police communications specialist who coordinates radio traffic and helps maintain contact between different law enforcement units.

41.description: A Ghostbloods coordinator who manages their response to The Set's final operations while maintaining their protective mission for Scadrial.

26.description: A research assistant who helps develop countermeasures to The Set's harmonium weapons while supporting legitimate research efforts.

relationships.Ranette: Provides technical data for weapons defense

24.description: The Set's transportation coordinator who manages movement of personnel and equipment while maintaining operational security.

29.description: A special investigator who handles cases involving unusual circumstances and helps coordinate responses to off-world threats.

56.description: A mysterious figure with knowledge of the broader cosmere who provides crucial technical support during the final confrontation.

68.description: The immortal survivor of the original Kelsier's crew who emerges to help coordinate the final defense against off-world threats.

74.description: Helps coordinate the new order for Scadrial's relationship with the broader cosmere, drawing on centuries of experience and wisdom.

recaps.1: Wax and Steris settle into married life while investigating a series of harmonium-related explosions across Elendel. The Set's activities appear to be escalating with new technological capabilities.
recaps.2: MeLaan rejoins the team as they discover The Set is stealing large quantities of harmonium for unknown purposes. Strange incidents suggest off-world technology involvement.
recaps.3: Ranette develops new weapons to counter enhanced threats while Wayne struggles with personal relationships. The team uncovers evidence of The Set's infiltration at highest government levels.
recaps.4: Governor Innate coordinates government response as Reporter Yomen's investigations expose The Set's corruption. Marasi leads expanded law enforcement efforts against the criminal organization.
recaps.5: Dr. Kent Colms discovers disturbing applications for harmonium while Suit reveals the global scope of The Set's operations. The team realizes they're facing more than just local criminals.
recaps.6: Dr. Veillaind's research enables The Set's weapons program while security at harmonium facilities is increased. The stakes become clear as mass destruction weapons are developed.
recaps.7: Iron coordinates regional Set operations as the team discovers the organization's reach extends beyond Elendel. Constable forces adapt to enhanced criminal capabilities.
recaps.8: TenSoon provides historical context while Mayor Sequence becomes compromised in Bilming. The Set establishes a major base of operations in the outlying city.
recaps.9: Steel manages intelligence operations as Dr. Lena Vass makes weapons breakthroughs. The team realizes The Set has access to knowledge and technology from off-world sources.
recaps.10: Ambassador Dellash arrives from the South as The Set's operations threaten regional stability. Southern Scadrians become concerned about northern activities affecting their homeland.
recaps.11: Set enforcer Brace demonstrates enhanced abilities while communications are intercepted revealing coordination with external forces. The cosmic scope of the threat becomes apparent.
recaps.12: Engineer Nalef works to maintain technological neutrality as harmonium mining operations face increased Set infiltration. Foreman Clubs coordinates defensive measures.
recaps.13: Captain Elant provides aerial reconnaissance while The Set's supply networks are mapped by Quartermaster Vale. Transportation becomes crucial for all factions.
recaps.14: Coinshot Kane reveals enhanced allomantic abilities as Training Sergeant Ham prepares constables for superhuman threats. The Set's operatives are beyond normal human capabilities.
recaps.15: Agent Tress reveals Ghostbloods operations while Evidence Specialist Kell analyzes off-world technology samples. A third faction emerges in the conflict.
recaps.16: FeLaan joins other kandra in providing counsel while Dr. Lestibournes treats Set-related casualties in Bilming. The ancient servants of Harmony become active participants.
recaps.17: Agent Deep infiltrates government operations while Trade Representative Clubs works to maintain Southern relations. Set infiltration reaches the highest levels of power.
recaps.18: Agent Riina provides intelligence from deep cover while Set communications reveal coordination with cosmic-level forces. The true scope of external interference is revealed.
recaps.19: VarSell operates as divine intelligence agent while Set medical support maintains enhanced operatives. Harmony begins active participation in mortal affairs.
recaps.20: Citizen Leader Vince organizes Bilming resistance while Radio Operator Lind coordinates law enforcement communications. Civilian populations mobilize against Set occupation.
recaps.21: Set Field Commander leads tactical operations while noble houses coordinate defensive preparations. The conflict escalates to open warfare between factions.
recaps.22: Keeper Sazed-Ka provides historical context while Weapons Tech Straff develops advanced Set arsenal. Past cosmic conflicts offer guidance for current crisis.
recaps.23: Pilot Shan provides aerial support while Detective Shai investigates complex inter-jurisdictional cases. Multi-dimensional coordination becomes essential for all sides.
recaps.24: Transport Chief Yomen manages Set logistics while noble security forces prepare for final confrontation. Resources and positioning become crucial factors.
recaps.25: Kelsier's involvement is revealed while Harmony provides direct guidance. The true nature of the cosmic conflict and the identity of all major players becomes clear.
recaps.26: Research Assistant Elend develops countermeasures while OreSeur coordinates divine communications. Scientific and spiritual resources combine against the external threat.
recaps.27: Information Broker Felt provides crucial intelligence while Set communications break down under pressure. Information warfare becomes as important as physical conflict.
recaps.28: Dr. Harding documents medical effects while Guard Captain Dockson coordinates noble defenses. The human cost of cosmic warfare becomes apparent.
recaps.29: Investigator Goradel handles special cases while Lord Harms coordinates political support. Unusual circumstances require specialized responses from all participants.
recaps.30: Ranette's weapons prove crucial while Pilot Shan leads aerial operations. Technology and tactics evolved for cosmic-level conflict are finally deployed.
recaps.31: Captain Aradel coordinates emergency response while Transport Chief manages final logistics. The immediate battle preparations are completed by all factions.
recaps.32: Mayor Sequence's true loyalties are revealed while Iron coordinates final Set operations. The extent of Set infiltration and external control becomes fully apparent.
recaps.33: Dr. Lena Vass completes weapons research while Enforcer Dox provides Ghostbloods protection. All factions prepare their ultimate capabilities for final confrontation.
recaps.34: OreSeur delivers divine messages while Agent Deep sabotages government response. Communication and counter-communication reach critical importance.
recaps.35: Wayne makes personal sacrifices while Miles Dagouter returns with enhanced abilities. Past enemies return with cosmic-level enhancements for final battle.
recaps.36: Telsin confronts family loyalty while Coinshot Kane pursues enhanced assassination missions. Personal relationships become weapons in cosmic-level conflict.
recaps.37: Captain Elant leads aerial combat while Information Broker coordinates intelligence. Multi-dimensional warfare requires unprecedented coordination.
recaps.38: Agent Crow arrives as Autonomy's direct representative while Former Obligator provides historical context. The full power of external Shardic intervention is revealed.
recaps.39: Agent Riina reveals crucial intelligence while Lady Sequence coordinates noble resources. The final pieces of information needed for victory are gathered.
recaps.40: Paalm is revealed as Avatar of Autonomy while Dr. Lestibournes treats massive casualties. The true nature of the external threat and its local manifestation becomes clear.
recaps.41: Coordinator Demoux manages Ghostbloods response while Guard Captain protects noble houses. Strategic coordination reaches its most crucial phase.
recaps.42: Former Obligator Rashek provides historical guidance while Set Enforcer demonstrates peak enhancement. Past wisdom and present power clash in preparation for climax.
recaps.43: Enforcer Dox protects Ghostbloods operations while Medic Frost maintains Set enhancements. All factions deploy their ultimate protective and enhancement capabilities.
recaps.44: Citizen Leader Vince coordinates evacuation while Pilot Shan provides air support. Civilian protection becomes as important as military operations.
recaps.45: Kelsier reveals his true role while Iyatil commands Ghostbloods forces. The protective conspiracy to defend Scadrial from cosmic interference is fully revealed.
recaps.46: Keeper provides cosmic historical context while Governor Innate makes crisis decisions. Leadership at all levels must confront cosmic-level responsibilities.
recaps.47: Nazh provides scholarly analysis while Training Sergeant prepares forces for enhanced combat. Knowledge and preparation combine for unprecedented warfare.
recaps.48: Agent Crow demonstrates off-world powers while Captain Marsh coordinates estate defenses. Cosmic-level abilities clash with determined local resistance.
recaps.49: Trade Representative maintains commercial stability while VarSell provides divine intelligence. Even during cosmic warfare, practical and spiritual concerns must be balanced.
recaps.50: Baon coordinates off-world intelligence while Harmony confronts Autonomy's direct intervention. The conflict reaches truly cosmic proportions with Shards directly involved.
recaps.51: Enforcer Dox protects final operations while Research Assistant supports countermeasures. Protection and counter-development become equally crucial.
recaps.52: Former Obligator provides final historical insights while Radio Operator maintains critical communications. Past wisdom and present coordination combine for climactic preparation.
recaps.53: Investigator Goradel handles crisis cases while Quartermaster manages final supplies. Special circumstances require specialized responses as resources become critical.
recaps.54: FeLaan coordinates kandra response while Weapons Tech maintains final enhancements. Ancient servants and modern technology combine for ultimate confrontation.
recaps.55: Iyatil leads direct Ghostbloods intervention while Marasi commands emergency coordination. Hidden protectors reveal themselves as official forces coordinate response.
recaps.56: Tech Specialist Hoid provides cosmic knowledge while Guard Chief defends harmonium supplies. Worldhopper wisdom and local resources combine against external threat.
recaps.57: Information Broker coordinates final intelligence while Trade Representative maintains stability. Information and commercial stability become weapons in cosmic conflict.
recaps.58: Agent Crow reveals off-world assault while Dr. Veillaind completes mass destruction weapons. The full scope of external invasion and internal betrayal becomes apparent.
recaps.59: VarSell provides crucial divine intelligence while Constable Fader observes final Set movements. Spiritual guidance and ground-level observation combine for tactical advantage.
recaps.60: Kelsier confronts the team directly while Suit makes his final play. The true scope of the protective conspiracy and the destructive invasion both reach culmination.
recaps.61: Coordinator Demoux manages strategic operations while Investigator handles crisis response. Multi-level coordination becomes essential as all plans reach implementation.
recaps.62: Keeper provides final cosmic context while Medic Frost maintains enhanced operatives. Historical wisdom and enhanced capabilities combine for ultimate confrontation.
recaps.63: Enforcer Dox protects Ghostbloods final moves while Evidence Specialist analyzes cosmic technology. Protection and analysis combine as all factions make final preparations.
recaps.64: Dr. Lestibournes treats massive casualties while Constable Evidence analyzes aftermath. Medical care and forensic analysis become crucial as warfare reaches peak intensity.
recaps.65: MeLaan makes ultimate sacrifice while Harmony intervenes directly. Personal heroism and divine intervention combine to protect Scadrial from cosmic-level destruction.
recaps.66: Ranette's cosmic weapons prove decisive while Telsin makes final choice. Advanced technology and personal loyalty determine the outcome of cosmic-level conflict.
recaps.67: Information networks coordinate final intelligence while Radio Operator maintains crucial communications. Information warfare reaches its climax as all sides coordinate final moves.
recaps.68: Lord Spook emerges to coordinate defense while Agent Crow leads final assault. Immortal wisdom and cosmic power clash in the ultimate confrontation for Scadrial's future.
recaps.69: All factions coordinate final battle while Set communications collapse. The culmination of cosmic warfare tests every alliance and capability developed throughout the crisis.
recaps.70: Kelsier makes final sacrifice while Tech Specialist provides crucial cosmic support. Ultimate heroism and worldhopper knowledge combine to save Scadrial from external conquest.
recaps.71: Training Sergeant coordinates aftermath while Detective investigates cosmic consequences. Military organization and investigative analysis help process the results of cosmic conflict.
recaps.72: Wayne's final heroism while Citizen Leader coordinates reconstruction. Personal sacrifice and civilian leadership combine to ensure Scadrial's survival and recovery.
recaps.73: Captain Elant coordinates reconstruction support while Radio Operator manages communications. Aerial support and communications coordination help rebuild after cosmic conflict.
recaps.74: Lord Spook helps coordinate new order while Harmony establishes Scadrial's cosmic independence. Ancient wisdom and divine authority establish Scadrial's future relationship with the broader cosmere.
